attributes.action: Introduce legislation for 'presumed consent' for organ donation to be on the statute books by 2010
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: England should adopt the successful spanish system of 'presumed consent' and the wide deployment of transplant co-ordinators in NHS hospitals. Spain has the highest rate of organ donation in the world.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
